entries.title_d: The infiltration team that you provided the security codes to earlier had a successful mission but they have been spotted and need you to escort them to safety.
entries.title: Dathomir system: Rescue the Rebel infiltrators.
entries.thanks_5: Nice shot pilot, glad to have you with us!
entries.thanks_3: That takes care of them, lets get out of here!
entries.thanks_2: Great work everyone but we're not out of this yet!
entries.thanks_1: We are still in one piece, lets keep moving!
entries.taunt_5: Did you really expect to get away with it, rebel scum!
entries.taunt_4: Open fire guys, the Admiral wants their heads on a plate!
entries.taunt_2: You will not get away, even if it's the last thing I do!
entries.taunt_1: You will pay for what you did, Rebel filth!
entries.shields_depleted: Our shields are down, piece of junk Imperial ship!
entries.reason_5: They are everywhere, lets get the heck out of here!
entries.reason_4: They are everywhere, lets get the heck out of here!
entries.reason_3: They are everywhere, lets get the heck out of here!
entries.reason_2: They are everywhere, lets get the heck out of here!
entries.reason_1: They are everywhere, lets get the heck out of here!
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: The infiltration team provided us with these coordinates, meet with them there immediately.
entries.quest_location_d: This area of the Dathomir system is very dangerous and the infiltration team is being chased by Imperial fighters so come prepared.
entries.quest_escort_d: Assist the infiltration team in escaping. The Imperial fighters are fast and will undoubtedly catch up to you so be ready to defend them.
entries.panic_3: They are sending everything they got after us!
entries.hull_half: This crappy ship is falling apart, we need help over here!
entries.goodbye_5: Wohoo! We're home free thanks to you my friend!
entries.goodbye_4: Wohoo! We're home free thanks to you my friend!
entries.goodbye_3: Wohoo! We're home free thanks to you my friend!
entries.goodbye_2: Wohoo! We're home free thanks to you my friend!
entries.goodbye_1: Wohoo! We're home free thanks to you my friend!
entries.found_loc: Get to these coordinates immediately pilot!
entries.failed_protect: We lost contact with our men, they said you were no where near them when they were being attacked?! I expect a full report on what happened.
entries.failed_destroy: We lost contact with our men, what is going on out there pilot?!
entries.complete: The infiltrators are safe, great work pilot. Return to base for some rest before your next mission.
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.arrived_at_loc: The infiltrators ship should be at that location any second.
entries.abort: What are you doing?! We are doomed without your help!
